lexUnit.name: offended.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: filled with hurt, resentment or displeasure

sentence.text: She was offended and took it all personally .
He hoped she was n't offended , as a Times reporter .

Indenbaum knew how badly Modigliani needed money so he tried to offer him a sum within his means for the beautiful oil , but Modigliani was offended and obliged Indenbaum to accept the portrait as a present .
Nutty was not offended .
Mrs Friar looked offended but continued .
The challenge was accepted and amidst cheers from a group of semi-inebriated local husbands , the offended owner headed out the door in search of a couple of friendly Gardai .
In icy tones , the offended bureaucrat replied : ` For future reference , you will call me Mr Hooton , not Richard . "
The offended Titan lumbered forward and stamped upon one Raider , crushing it underfoot .
The Doctor looked offended .
Not everybody wants … ’ and trailed into silence , for Lily 's eyelids were now fluttering , holding back offended tears .
I do n't care if you 're offended , that 's the truth . "
Albert was offended , and swung his legs athletically out of bed , wincing on the distant side of his face .
His marriage to Osthryth , the sister of King Ecgfrith , inhibited him from bestowing royal favour on Wilfrid until Archbishop Theodore engineered a reconciliation of offended parties in 686 .
The law said nothing about duels between species which were not considered to be human -- although that did not prevent an offended party from seeking recourse .
I laughed -- I did n't feel offended .
The elite were offended , but the common people loved it .
He did n't seem offended , he did n't exactly appear contrite .
He looks offended when I tell him he is perceived as a man 's man .
" A little offended , Bagshot put the key in the lock and opened the door .
He looked offended but I guessed his idea of discretion was swapping his length of lead pipe for a rubber truncheon .
My hands dart indignantly about my desk as if they were offended mice , opening files , annotating minutes , picking up the receiver .
That may not , however , be enough for the offended partner .
